mapper.insert: insert into notice(title, contents, writer) values(#{title}, #{contents}, 'writer')
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where rowNum=#{rowNum}
update notice set viewCount= viewCount + 1 where rowNum=#{rowNum}
update notice, (SELECT seq, rowNum, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY writingTime) AS orderNum FROM notice ) x set notice.rowNum = x.orderNum where notice.seq = x.seq;
